name: OxfordPhysics
text: Quantum physics @maria__violaris, DPhil student at @UniofOxford, is creating a video series about #quantum paradoxes using @qiskit with @IBM Quantum. Her 1st video is about playing a game of quantum #minesweeper based on the quantum bomb paradox, watch ▶️ https://t.co/O9Bmmj2yQk https://t.co/5cQY45Szye
